name: Damned Valley
description:
Made for Arenas of Combat - Level Design Contest, category Spooky.

Survive in the spooky snowy village by sneaking in the shadows and eliminating enemies. The First one gets 15 kills, wins the round. Your starting weapon is the crossbow and you can find other weapons hidden on the map (sword, sniper and shotgun).

If you get damaged, there are green hearts for healing. Be careful not to disturb the ghost in the cemetery ^^

Thanks to community content creators:

LoiccoiL, books; minamelfina, bookshelf; sinowrathx, broken bridge; coreslinkous, damage zone, San Francisco house; Sgotach, factory building #2; BlueClairey, fancy wall lamp; Fexelitche, Fexel's jack'o'latern; grimland, food group, stack of coins 1; ocdfx, iron gate; HawkeMont, open book; Kirch, real ladder; Sgotach, sci-fi building #4; Bumblebear, stone tombstone; standardcombo, universal object spawner.
